p: Scutellarin was purchased from Xi'an TongZe Biotech Co., Ltd. (Xi'an, China). Dexamethasone was supplied by Dalian Meilun Biotechnology Co., Ltd. (Dalian, China). γ-Cyclodextrin was acquired from Maxdragon Biochem Ltd. (Guangzhou, China). Potassium hydroxide (KOH), methanol (MeOH), ethanol (EtOH), polyethylene glycol 20,000 (PEG 20,000) and glacial acetic acid of analytical grade were supplied by Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Phosphoric acid (85%–90%) of HPLC grade was purchased from Honeywell Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Methanol of HPLC grade was obtained from J&K Chemical Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Water was purified using a Milli-Q water purification system (Millipore, Billerica, MA, USA).
